I changed the link for the Book class button to https://www.redohealth.com.au/classes/. The pages she mentioned that are not found are Private pages. This will only be visible to logged-in users.

full_threads.body:

Can we prioritize Brendan's ticket first thing tomorrow morning?

Chris Paradowski
Partnerships Manager

---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Brendan McGovern <brendan@redohealth.com.au>
Date: Wed, 20 Apr 2022 at 8:46 pm
Subject: Fwd: Redo Health Google Ads - Copy for approval
To: Chris Paradowski - Wolf IQ <chris@wolfiq.com.au>


Hi Chris

I have Linda from practice edge working on some Google ads for me and she has spotted a few big errors - are you able to fix these issues ASAP?

As you can see it's even on the homepage!

Please disregard her comments about Calli and pilates as we have hidden those pages.

Thanks!

Brendan

---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Linda Holmes <linda@practiceedge.com.au>
Date: Wed, 20 Apr 2022 at 8:18 pm
Subject: Re: Redo Health Google Ads - Copy for approval
To: Brendan McGovern <brendan@redohealth.com.au>


Hi Brendan

The ads are ready to go, however I've spotted some issues with the landing pages which really need to be fixed before sending the Ads live.

I've noticed that the Vinyasa Yoga BOOK A CLASS button holds prominence on the physiotherapy page - featured in red, both in the header hero image and just below the fold.
https://www.redohealth.com.au/services/physiotherapy-balmain/

These BOOK A CLASS buttons should both be "Book Appointment" (physio) buttons.
We should also have a CALL button positioned beside these buttons, particularly as there is no CALL button in the header navigation.


On the Pilates page https://www.redohealth.com.au/services/pilates/
The Reform - Mat Pilates BOOK A CLASS button takes the user to this page with an error saying that the "page can't be found." https://www.redohealth.com.au/product/rebound-circuit-pilates-class/

The Rebound - Circuit Pilates BOOK A CLASS button takes the user to this page with an error saying that the "page can't be found."
https://www.redohealth.com.au/product/rebound-circuit-pilates-class/


The remaining BOOK A CLASS buttons take the user to either the https://www.redohealth.com.au/product/realign-vinyasa-yoga/ page or the
https://www.redohealth.com.au/classes/ page.

I feel like there would be more clarity for the user if they were taken to this page https://www.redohealth.com.au/classes/
where they can view the timetable of classes and all the classes, with their descriptions, prices etc.
This would create a better user experience.

At the bottom of the Pilates page is the section....
BOOK IN TODAY:
Meet Calli Butler, our in-house Pilates instructor
Both the BOOK A CLASS and BOOK APPOINTMENT buttons take the user to the book appointment page...
https://www.redohealth.com.au/appointment/


And the LEARN MORE ABOUT CALLI button goes to this page with an error saying that the "page can't be found."
https://www.redohealth.com.au/team-members/calli-butler/


It's really important that we strengthen the call-to-actions on the landing pages and provide the customer with clarity.
It will make a huge difference to conversions if we can improve user-experience on the website.
How do you feel about these suggested changes?

Please let me know.

Just to confirm I've set the Ads campaign to:
Budget: $50/day
Schedule: 6am to 11.45pm


Kind Regards
Linda



Linda Holmes
Google Ads Specialist

P: (03) 8418 8055
E: linda@practiceedge.com.au

We love feedback! Please rate me below.

Click on a face to provide feedback on my performance!


47 Chute Street, Diamond Creek VIC 3089
practiceedge.com.au
